Similar results about local fields have come up several times recently. This PR implements the iff statement, phrased as over a normed field. Future directions I'm working on building on this to characterize any such field: mixed char means that it is fin dim over Q_p.

I'm asking for help to understand what needs to be done to get this PR over the hill, or to rework it so that it is amenable for the community. Open to suggestions/generalizations, and happy to discuss the choice of normed field as opposed to Valued.

Perhaps the intermediate result showing that IsDiscreteValuationRing ùí™[K] due to the range of the norm being not densely ordered could be generalized/specialized to support Zm0 valued fields.
